skills.title: Skills

summary.text: Passionate about PC hardware and video games since forever, I naturally developed an interest in the software side of things. After several years in the French Navy, where I couldnâ€™t practice this core craft, I decided to retrain to fully dive into computer science. My path first led me to backend development, but over time I adopted more and more DevOps tools and practices, convinced that automation and infrastructure are key to building reliable and maintainable software. Today, I want to put this vision at the service of future projects and keep learning while sharing my discoveries.
